title: Prof. Liu honored with two awards for his research | College of Engineering | University of Illinois at Chicago

College of Engineering     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  College of Engineering      College of Engineering   Main Menu    Undergraduate           Admitted Student Information    Admissions    Advising    Career Outcomes    Diversity    Engineering Expo    FAQ    Majors and Minors    Paid Internships    Scholarships    Student Groups    Student Resources    Women in Engineering         Graduate    Departments    Research           Interdisciplinary Research    Labs and Centers         Support UIC           Donate Online    How to Give    Help Students    Empower Faculty    Capital Projects         About           Dean    Faculty    Administration    Staff    Alumni    Advisory Board    Facilities    Summer Camp    News    Contact          Eyebrow menu    Give    Careers    Alumni    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                     Prof. Liu honored with two awards for his research    Posted on September 28, 2018         story title   24th ACM SIGKDD Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining (KDD)  Innovation Award  Prof. Liu was awarded with KDD’s highest honor, the Innovation Award which is awarded to researchers who have made significant technical contributions with lasting impact. Liu was honored “for his seminal contributions to the foundation of data mining and applications, particularly in opinion mining.” The annual conference took place in London from August 19-23.    Illinois Science & Technology Coalition (ISTC) Researchers to Know 2018  Category: Technologists  Prof. Liu was one of 22 people in five categories honored for their research. Liu was recognized for his research in the areas of sentiment analysis, machine learning and data mining.  Some of his highlighted research includes using association rules to provide an innovate means for classification in data mining and applying his research to help detect fake online reviews.         View Prof. Liu's Profile      Modified on September 23, 2019
